50 -    def in_hdfs(self): 

51          listing = hdfs.ls(self.graph_handle)["stdout"].split("\n") 
52          found = False 
53          disk_tail = self.graph_handle.split("/")[-1] 
54          for line in listing: 
55              hdfs_tail = line.split("/")[-1] 
56              if disk_tail == hdfs_tail: 
57                  found = True 
58                  break 
59          return found
